description: Listing products in combinations of all filters and sort

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: List of categories to be filtered by as comma separated values

parameters.name: price_gte
parameters.description: Price greater than or equal to

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: To be sorted by attribute and direction

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the paginated results
